SELECT m.ordersid, m.mainitemid, i.projName, i.itemprice, m.spenttime, m.spenttime * i.itemprice AS totalcost FROM mainprojreg AS m JOIN mainitem AS i ON (m.mainitemid = i.id)
and m.ordersid=#{ordersid}

select o.id as ordersid, o.customerid, c.numbering, c.contactinfo, v.id as vehicleid, v.platenum, o.warrcontent, b.settlementdate, b.totalamount from orders as o join customer as c on (o.customerid=c.id) join vehicle as v on (o.vehicleid = v.id) join balancesheet as b on(o.id = b.ordersid)
and b.settlementdate between concat(#{starttime},' 00:00:00') and concat(#{endtime},' 23:59:59')

select sum(case month(m.allocatetime) when '1' then 1 else 0 end) as '1', sum(case month(m.allocatetime) when '2' then 1 else 0 end) as '2', sum(case month(m.allocatetime) when '3' then 1 else 0 end) as '3', sum(case month(m.allocatetime) when '4' then 1 else 0 end) as '4', sum(case month(m.allocatetime) when '5' then 1 else 0 end) as '5', sum(case month(m.allocatetime) when '6' then 1 else 0 end) as '6', sum(case month(m.allocatetime) when '7' then 1 else 0 end) as '7', sum(case month(m.allocatetime) when '8' then 1 else 0 end) as '8', sum(case month(m.allocatetime) when '9' then 1 else 0 end) as '9', sum(case month(m.allocatetime) when '10' then 1 else 0 end) as '10', sum(case month(m.allocatetime) when '11' then 1 else 0 end) as '11', sum(case month(m.allocatetime) when '12' then 1 else 0 end) as '12' from ( select DISTINCT o.id,p.allocatetime from orders as o join personallocate as p on(o.id = p.ordersid) ) as m where year(m.allocatetime)=#{year};

select sum(case month(m.settlementdate) when '1' then m.totalamount else 0 end) as '1', sum(case month(m.settlementdate) when '2' then m.totalamount else 0 end) as '2', sum(case month(m.settlementdate) when '3' then m.totalamount else 0 end) as '3', sum(case month(m.settlementdate) when '4' then m.totalamount else 0 end) as '4', sum(case month(m.settlementdate) when '5' then m.totalamount else 0 end) as '5', sum(case month(m.settlementdate) when '6' then m.totalamount else 0 end) as '6', sum(case month(m.settlementdate) when '7' then m.totalamount else 0 end) as '7', sum(case month(m.settlementdate) when '8' then m.totalamount else 0 end) as '8', sum(case month(m.settlementdate) when '9' then m.totalamount else 0 end) as '9', sum(case month(m.settlementdate) when '10' then m.totalamount else 0 end) as '10', sum(case month(m.settlementdate) when '11' then m.totalamount else 0 end) as '11', sum(case month(m.settlementdate) when '12' then m.totalamount else 0 end) as '12' from ( select o.id as ordersid, b.totalamount, b.settlementdate from orders as o join balancesheet as b on(o.id=b.ordersid) ) as m where year(m.settlementdate)=#{year}

select sum(case month(m.purtime) when '1' then m.totalpurchase else 0 end) as '1', sum(case month(m.purtime) when '2' then m.totalpurchase else 0 end) as '2', sum(case month(m.purtime) when '3' then m.totalpurchase else 0 end) as '3', sum(case month(m.purtime) when '4' then m.totalpurchase else 0 end) as '4', sum(case month(m.purtime) when '5' then m.totalpurchase else 0 end) as '5', sum(case month(m.purtime) when '6' then m.totalpurchase else 0 end) as '6', sum(case month(m.purtime) when '7' then m.totalpurchase else 0 end) as '7', sum(case month(m.purtime) when '8' then m.totalpurchase else 0 end) as '8', sum(case month(m.purtime) when '9' then m.totalpurchase else 0 end) as '9', sum(case month(m.purtime) when '10' then m.totalpurchase else 0 end) as '10', sum(case month(m.purtime) when '11' then m.totalpurchase else 0 end) as '11', sum(case month(m.purtime) when '12' then m.totalpurchase else 0 end) as '12' from ( SELECT p.id, p.partcategoryname as purtime, p.totalpurchase from partproc as p where p.purchstatus='1' ) as m where year(m.purtime)=#{year}

select sum(b.totalamount) as total from orders as o join balancesheet as b on (o.id = b.ordersid) where YEAR(b.settlementdate)=#{year} UNION select SUM(partproc.totalpurchase) as total from partproc where YEAR(partproc.partcategoryname)=#{year}
